articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Aircraft-sized asteroid set to pass Earth by a close margin today, reveals NASA; Check details - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA says as many as four asteroids have been predicted to pass Earth today, March 20, and one of them is as big as an aircraft! Know all about this close encounter with an aircraft-sized asteroid.
articles.content: In the last few days, we've seen numerous asteroids come close to Earth. Just yesterday, as many as four space rocks passed the planet by a close margin. Although none of them impacted the surface, t… [+1871 chars]

articles.title: Health experts plead for unvaxxed Americans to get measles shot as cases rise - Ars Technica
articles.description: The US hit last year's total in under 12 weeks, suggesting we're in for a bad time.
